refnamediv.refpurpose: The Report Command allows you to write data to a text file.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Script Syntax
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis:
Report ReportName DataList
ReportName ReportName option allows you to specify the ReportFile for data output. DataList DataList option allows you to output data to the Filename specified by the ReportName. Multiple objects can be written in the DataList when they are separated by spaces.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The Report command allows you to report data at specific points in your mission sequence. GMAT allows you to insert Report command into the Mission tree at various locations. Report command can be used through GMATâ€™s GUI or the script interface. The parameters reported by Report command are placed into a report file that can be accessed at a later time.

refsection.title: Remarks
refsection.para: Report command only allows you to report data to a report file at specific points in your mission. If you want data to be reported at each propagation step of the entire mission duration, then you should not use Report command. Instead you should use ReportFile resource. See ReportFile resource section for details on the syntax that allows you to report data at each propagation step.
